name: Puzlkind
description:
Multiplayer artisan puzzles with voice chat.

Do you miss puzzling with friends and family?
Craving museum culture and original art?
Or are you wondering how to achieve world peace, piece by piece?

Welcome to Puzlkind, an intentionally ad-free, art-filled, and inclusive space where you can puzzle and talk with friends, family, peeps, and puzzle pals! Begun as a response to multiple pandemics, Michael Ferrier and Sarah Jane Lapp developed this app to encourage well-being, promote equity and inclusion, and connect via co-creation.

Check out Sarah Jane’s ever-growing library of puzzle designs. Eight years of puzzle designs - very personal, sometimes political, and often involving goats, they're made all the more wondrous (so much for humility) when showcased by UX wizard, Ruth Chung, and 3D coder wrangler, Michael Ferrier (founder of Puzzle Together).

New to digital puzzling?
Try our three free puzzles

Tired of going solo?
Meet new puzl pals during Sarah Jane’s free, recurring Puzl with the Planet Happy Hour.

Want to ensure access for all?
Become a Pay It Forward Puzlkind Patron

Puzl tov! Let's celebrate our path to peace...
